name: Sala - Blue Scales
text: Once per turn: You can return one "Sala -" card from your Pendulum Zone to your hand; Place this card in the Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: You can only Pendulum Summon "Sala -" Monsters. This effect cannot be negated. If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s), you can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Sala - Blue Scale" Once per turn.
